name: Calamitous Flailing
text: You cause the victim’s attacks to careen wildly, endangering itself and those around it. Your target gains a 25% miss chance on all attack rolls. If an attack misses due to this magical effect, the victim instead targets an ally, or else itself if there are no allies within range of the original attack. Apply the attack roll for the original attack to the new target’s Armor Class to determine if this attack hits. This is a curse effect.
text_zh: 你使受术者的攻击疯狂的失控，令他自身与周遭的人陷入危险。受术者在所有攻击骰上获得25%失手律。如果某一次攻击因为此法术效果而失手，受术者转而攻击一位盟友，或如果在最初攻击范围中没有他的盟友，他会转向攻击自己。使用最初攻击的攻击骰来对抗新目标的盔甲等级(Armor Class¬)，来判定这攻击是否击中。这是一个诅咒效果。
